statements: UPDATE atmospheric_pressure SET pressure = 1000.5, location = 'London' WHERE timestamp = '2022-10-25 12:00:00';
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure SET location = 'New York', pressure = 980.2 WHERE timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure SET pressure = 1001.5, location = 'London' WHERE timestamp = '2022-09-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure SET location = 'New York', pressure = 1010.2 WHERE timestamp = '2022-09-05 15:30:00';
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure_data SET pressure = 100 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:00:00';
UPDATE pressure_patterns_detected SET end_timestamp = '2022-01-11 12:00:00', start_timestamp = '2022-01-11 08:00:00' WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure_data SET pressure = 100 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE pressure_patterns_detected SET start_timestamp = '2022-02-01 12:00:00', end_timestamp = '2022-02-15 18:00:00' WHERE pattern_id = 5;
UPDATE atmospheric_data SET pressure = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pattern_data SET severity_level = 3, time = '2022-05-12 10:30:00' WHERE data_id = 2;
UPDATE atmospheric_data SET pressure = 1008.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pattern_data SET severity_level = 3, time = '2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE pattern_id = 5 AND data_id = 10;
UPDATE PressureData SET pressure = 1000 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
UPDATE Sensor SET sensor_type = 'humidity', location_id = 2 WHERE sensor_id = 1
UPDATE PressureData SET pressure = 100.25 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:00:00';
UPDATE Sensor SET location_id = 3, sensor_type = 'Humidity' WHERE sensor_id = 7;
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure_changes SET pressure = 1020.5 WHERE timestamp = '2022-06-15 08:30:00'
UPDATE pressure_patterns SET description = 'Identified unique weather pattern' WHERE pattern_name = 'Rainy'
UPDATE atmospheric_pressure_changes SET pressure = 1012.5 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00'
UPDATE pressure_patterns SET description = 'Identifies sudden pressure drops' WHERE pattern_name = 'Spike'
